resources.name: Crear Negocio

body.text:
{
  "name": "Salón Bella María",
  "description": "Salón de belleza especializado en tratamientos capilares",
  "email": "info@salon-bella-maria.com",
  "phone": "+57300123456",
  "address": "Calle 123 #45-67",
  "city": "Bogotá",
  "country": "Colombia",
  "subdomain": "salon-bella-maria"
}
